chapter-9_key2: The shutil.copy() function will copy a single `file`, while shutil.copytree() will copy an entire folder, along with all its contents.
chapter-9_key3: The shutil.move() function is used for renaming `files`, as well as moving them.
chapter-9_key4: The send2trash functions will move a `file` or folder to the recycle bin, while shutil functions will permanently delete `files` and folders.
chapter-9_key5: The zip`file`.Zip`File`() function is equivalent to the open() function; the first argument is the `file`name, and the second argument is the mode to open the ZIP `file` in (read, write, or append).
